section.title: Create New Contract
section.para: To create a new Contract, select the "New Contract" option. The following screen will appear:

When creating a new Contract, you are presented with the following options:
Vendor #
Enter the Vendor number for the Contract.
Contract #
Enter a number to identify the Contract.
Description
Enter a description for the Contract.
Effective
Enter the first date on which the Contract will be valid.
Expires
Enter the last date on which the Contract will be valid, e.g. the date the Contract expires.
To view or enter Item Sources for this Contract, select the Item Sources tab. The following will be displayed in the window:

You will be presented with the following information and options:
Item Sources
A list of existing Contract Items with Sources will be displayed.
To see Purchase Orders for the Item Source, click the arrow to the left of the Item. To open the Item Source, double click the Item Source Line.
PRINT
Select PRINT to print a list of the Contract Item Sources.
NEW ITEM SOURCE
Select this option to enter a new Item Source. Detailed information on adding a new Item Source is available under the section .
NEW PO
Select this option to create a Purchase Order under this Contract. Detailed information on adding a new Purchase Order is available under the section
If an existing Purchase Order already exists under the Contract, you can choose to select to use the existing Purchase Order or to create a new Purchase Order. .
EDIT PO
Select to make changes to an existing Purchase Order.
The Contract Item Source line must be expanded in order to highlight the relevant Purchase Order which will enable the buttons for working with the Purchase Order.
VIEW PO
Click the VIEW PO button to to view the selected Purchase Order.
DELETE PO
Select to delete the highlighted Purchase Order.
RELEASE PO
Click RELEASE PO to release the selected Purchase Order without leaving the Contract window.
NEW RECEIPT
Select this option to enter a new Purchase Order Receipt.
NEW RETURN
Select this option to enter a Purchase Order return.
To enter notes for the Contract, select the Notes tab. The following will be displayed in the window:
The area in the Notes tab can be use to enter information about the Contract.
